name: Rocket Thru Cave
description:
Have you ever wanted to pilot a rocket thru a cave? Now you can! This game has six levels. How far can you get? This is the second game in the Complete C# Unity Developer 3D course.

Controls: 
  • Space or Left Ctrl to fire main rocket thrust
  • Left and Right Arrow Keys or A and D to rotate rocket.

Tintin rocket found on yobi3d.com
